name: Cash Only POS Sales Transaction
query:
Select 
si.customer as "Customer:Data:300",
si.letter_head as "POS:Data:150",
sum(sit.qty) as "Total Qty:Int:50",
sum(sit.net_amount) as "Total:Currency:300"
from `tabSales Invoice Item` sit join `tabSales Invoice` si on sit.parent=si.name where si.is_pos=1 and si.docstatus=1 and si.posting_date = %(date)s and si.owner = %(user)s and si.mode_of_payment=%(mode)s group by si.customer,si.letter_head
